description:
With math we play :)

Play with math problems. Fast wins will give you pleasure.

Share your success with your classmates. 

Introduction to mathematics always begins with a simple - with calculations in the mind.

This educational game was created to make studing more fun.

You have to turn the mathematical operations in one minute so that only the correct number remains.

Carefully drag the numbers, sometimes a straight line path is not the fastest way :)

Compete with the whole world.

It's not so easy to go through all 100 levels at once. Can you will winner?

Easy levels will be more complicated. Get your brilliants then add time on levels

Yes, time is money. So, I hope that this game is not timekiller, but usefull tool for your brain.

If you want invest in yourself, workout brain and loves math problems, it game for your.
